text.0: to him the farrenowned the wise ordainer ancient and glorious a song i offer.
text.1: enthroned in oil the asura blissgiver is agni firm support of noble riches.
text.2: by holy law they kept supporting order by help of sacrifice in loftiest heaven.
text.3: they who attained with born men to the unborn men seated on that stay heavens firm sustainer.
text.4: averting woe they labour hard to bring him the ancient plenteous food as power resistless.
text.5: may he born newly conquer his assailants round him they stand as round an angry lion.
text.6: when like a mother spreading forth to nourish to cherish and regard each man that liveth.
text.7: consuming all the strength that thou hast gotten thou wanderest round thyself in varied fashion.
text.8: may strength preserve the compass of thy vigour god that broad stream of thine that beareth riches.
text.9: thou like a thief who keeps his refuge secret hast holpen atri to great wealth by teaching.
